choiceresponse.p: When creating a consumer group, you must specify the initial message ID for the group to begin processing from.
Which of the following can be used as an initial message ID when creating a consumer group?
choiceresponse.label: Choose two or more answers:

checkboxgroup.choice: The partial ID 0 to begin with the first message
The full ID 0-0, to begin with the first message
Any valid partial or full ID

div.p: The XGROUP command accepts full or partial message IDs when specifying the initial ID that the group should start reading from. The special ID $ is also accepted, and will cause the group to start reading messages added to the stream after the group itself was created.
